reality condensed: There was no spoon.

reality condensed: Saroo mentions no friendships in this place.

reality condensed: This is the kind of thing that went down.

reality condensed: Saroo made no friends at the detention centre.

film condensed: Saroo explores his new home.

film condensed: They adopt another boy, Mantosh.
reality condensed: They did adopt another boy, but much later.

reality condensed: Mantosh had been affected by repeated trauma.

film condensed: Sue invited the adoption lady to eat.
reality condensed: This is not known but seems reasonable.

film condensed: Mantosh is violent & John has to restrain him.
reality condensed: Mantosh did act out physically.

film condensed: Saroo is left alone as Mantosh goes berserk.
reality condensed: Saroo did have to watch as his parents dealt with Mantosh.

film condensed: Saroo comforts Sue, who is sad.
reality condensed: It may have happened.

film condensed: Saroo grows up & swims in the ocean.
reality condensed: He did grow up & he did love the ocean.

film condensed: Mantosh misses a goodbye lunch.
reality condensed: There is no record of this in Saroo's account.

film condensed: Saroo visits Mantosh & berates him.
reality condensed: May have happened, but is not recorded.

film condensed: Saroo goes to Melbourne to study.
reality condensed: Saroo went to Canberra to study.

film condensed: He sees Lucy for the first time.
reality condensed: There was no Lucy.

reality condensed: Lucy didn't. Saroo probably did.

film condensed: Saroo talks about his past in a seminar.
reality condensed: Saroo talked about his past more in Canberra.

film condensed: Lucy jokes about cricket & Saroo is smitten.
reality condensed: Nah. Lucy is a screenwriter's contrivance.

film condensed: Saroo & Lucy meet at a distance.
reality condensed: They did not.

film condensed: Saroo & Lucy arrive together.
reality condensed: There was no Saroo & Lucy.

reality condensed: Saroo knew a lot of Indians at college.

film condensed: Saroo is taught how to use naan bread.

film condensed: Saroo is entranced by jalebis.

film condensed: Saroo doesn't want to talk about it.

reality condensed: Lucy's mother is as fictitious as Lucy.

film condensed: Lucy asks about Google Earth.

film condensed: Saroo has a mango memory in bed with Lucy.

film condensed: Saroo gets up & Googles, all forlorn.
reality condensed: He Googled, but not in these circumstances.

film condensed: Saroo returns to Hobart.

film condensed: Saroo is depressed, Lucy concerned.
reality condensed: He was fine, & Lucy wasn't real.

film condensed: Saroo & Lucy up a mountain.
reality condensed: Nope. This didn't happen either.

film condensed: At dinner, Saroo silences Lucy.
reality condensed: Saroo didn't tell his parents about the search.

film condensed: Things escalate, the atmosphere deteriorates.
reality condensed: Thankfully, this is not real.

film condensed: Saroo apologises to Lucy.
reality condensed: No need. She isn't real.

film condensed: He is becoming obsessed & depressed.

film condensed: Saroo & Lucy row about things.
reality condensed: No Lucy, no party, no row.

film condensed: Saroo & Lucy row in the street.
reality condensed: They didn't row anywhere.

film condensed: Saroo leaves Lucy.
reality condensed: Saroo never even met Lucy.

film condensed: Saroo continues his search.
reality condensed: Not in these circumstances.

film condensed: He is excited by a red herring.
reality condensed: This happened often.

film condensed: Saroo gets quite depressed about his lack of success.

film condensed: John visits but is ignored.
reality condensed: No such visit took place.

reality condensed: Saroo worked in the family business.

film condensed: Saroo, in a daze, bumps into Lucy.
reality condensed: No. This simply didn't happen.

film condensed: Saroo discusses his obsession.
reality condensed: He did, years later, with somebody else.

film condensed: Lucy talks about her life.
reality condensed: Lucy had no life, being made-up & all.

film condensed: Saroo runs home.
reality condensed: Saroo was given a lift.

reality condensed: This was his partner Lisa, much later.
